issue.title: [Rust] Initial sort implementation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7705](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7705). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
An initial sort implementation that allows sorting an array by various options (e.g. sort order). This is mainly to iterate on the design and inner workings of a sort algorithm.
